entry.title: Self Adhesive Paper (PSA) Discs 4S Aluminum Oxide Material 5 Inch x Non-Vacuum - Saitech Sait
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sait
Type: PSA Discs
Price: 0.54 - 0.63 (8 variants)

[shortdesc]
  • Excels on painted and primed surfaces
  • Our best performing, longest lasting paper disc
  • Long lasting performance and fast removal rates for fine finishing of auto body, wood, metal, and marine applications
  • Premium Aluminum oxide grain - For dry use only
  • Premium Stearate coating and open coat structure lubricates and prevents loading
  • Available in weights: InchC Inch medium-weight, low flexibility
  • Premium - Paper Discs Hook & Loop
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Specifications

    Brand Sait
    Line Saitech
    Backing Material Paper
    Diameter 5 Inch
    Dimensions 5xNH
    Material 4S
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type PSA Discs
    Vacuum Type Non-Vacuum

    Extra Product Information

  • EXCELS ON PAINTED AND PRIMED SURFACES Our best performing, longest lasting paper disc Long lasting performance and fast removal rates for fine finishing of auto body, wood, metal, and marine applications Premium Aluminum Oxide grain - For dry use only Pre

    • Product Information

  • Premium - Paper Discs Individual PSA

    • Suggested Application

  • For use on: Metal, Wood
